amendment.description: Amendment sought to allow U.S. ports to levy a fee on containers and use that fee to pay for security and infrastructure at the ports.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 109-160 to allow U.S. ports to levy a container or tonnage fee on imports.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 111 - 310 (Roll no. 376).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Rohrabacher.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 111 - 310 (Roll no. 376).
